parameters.name: ApplicationId
parameters.description:
The ID of the internal access application. You can obtain the application ID by calling the following operations:

*   [ListPrivateAccessApplications](~~ListPrivateAccessApplications~~): queries all internal access applications.
*   [CreatePrivateAccessApplication](~~CreatePrivateAccessApplication~~): creates an internal access application.

parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The page number. Valid values: 1 to 10000.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the internal access tag. The name must be 1 to 128 characters in length and can contain letters, digits, periods (.), underscores (\_), and hyphens (-).

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: 1 to 1000.

parameters.name: PolicyId
parameters.description:
The ID of the internal access policy. You can obtain the policy ID by calling the following operations:

*   [ListPrivateAccessPolices](~~ListPrivateAccessPolices~~): queries all internal access policies.
*   [CreatePrivateAccessPolicy](~~CreatePrivateAccessPolicy~~): creates an internal access policy.

parameters.name: SimpleMode
parameters.description: Specifies whether to enable the simple query mode. A value of true specifies that policy IDs are not queried.

parameters.name: TagIds
parameters.description: The IDs of internal access tags. You can specify up to 100 tag IDs.
